description:
Visit my Amazon affiliated links to pick up craft supplies:
Surebonder Gluegun: https://amzn.to/2smsqZV
Surebonder nozzle assortment: https://amzn.to/2kDBDsH
Great gluestick deal: https://amzn.to/2LOJCzF
Wood discs: https://amzn.to/2HLifTV
Elmer's Glue-All: https://amzn.to/2JLKJyG
Battle Mats: https://amzn.to/2HLvYhB

Surebonder website: https://surebonder.com/

Tomb of Annihilation Amazon affiliated link: https://amzn.to/2JJNgJy

Learn to make weeping jungle tree models for all your miniature 28mm tabletop games such as Dungeons and Dragons and Pathfinder. This easy craft will save you valuable time, so you have more hours to play the games you love. The materials are also cheap and easy to obtain so this project wonâ€™t break your budget. Bring a few crafting tools and sit down with DM Scotty to begin your DIY crafting adventure. You can find the tools you need at my website ( http://www.thedmscraft.com/ ). So grab your gluegun and Go Forth and Craft.

The Tabletop Crafters Guild Site:
http://www.tabletopcraftersguild.com/

Become a friend to the Craft and help me bring more content to the community by joining my Patreon. You will have access to exclusive DM Scotty content:  https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

Join The Tabletop Crafters Guild Facebook group for more crafts and camaraderie. 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

Twitter: @TheDMsCraft
title: DIY Weeping Jungle Trees for Tabletop Games (DM's Craft #193)
